name: DCRN
description: Decred-Next retaining the excellent features such as high security, strong adaptability, and sustainable development of Decred. Moreover, we plan to achieve EVM, sharding, OmniLayer, and other features in the future. Decred-Next enables more efficient circulation of digital assets and allows users to write smart contracts and issue NFTs. Compared with Decred, Decred-Next is more efficient, robust, vitative, and competitive.
